H0.text: What is another name for ultra-violet light. Violetlight

H1.text: What is another name for ultra-violet light. Ultralux

H2.text: What is another name for ultra-violet light. Actinic Radiation

H3.text: What is another name for ultra-violet light. Blacklite

A5.text: Actinic light denotes light from solar or other sources that can cause photochemical reactions such as photosynthesis in a species

A6.text: blacklight is a lamp that emits long-wave (UV-A) ultraviolet light
